prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The project is divided into several packages published from a single monorepo, with some packages marked as recommended for first-time users.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Monorepo, packages, project, recommended, first-time users
